comment:
>>38906656

“What else?”

“Creds. Splitting them evenly.” Kainzo says. “A pile of crystals. Resonant Fractallines.”

“Haven't seen those yet.” Ayla says. “They must be a tier up, or they've got a special property. Sounds intense, though. Think you could send 'em my way?”

“Hold on, there.” Donnel interrupts. “Those would fetch a fair bit of coin on the market if even you haven't heard of them. I think we deserve a cut.”

“Well, I want new guns.” Vyx pouts.

“What? Your guns are already good!” Nel says, giving her an incredulous look.

“More damage!” She yells, and he shrinks back a bit.

“We should see if they're usable by Artificers, first. Wouldn't want to hand them off to someone who's just gonna blow them on nothing.” Aelriss says.

“Guys. Seriously, calm your shit. There's a ton here, and I bet the crystal soldiers have more.” Kainzo says. “I'm just going to split them evenly from here on out.”

“Fine whth me. That all?” You ask.

“One more thing—the 'Shattered Golem's Eye'.” Kainzo says.

“Ascheritte, you fool!” Dorian shouts. “You broke it!”

“Hey, how do we know you didn't break it?” Nel and Tatsumaki surround Dorian, who scurries over to Ayla's side in search of support.

“Maybe it's supposed to be like that.” Andor says. “Like a death drop.”

“Right... Who gets it?” Kainzo asks. “Is there anyone who -doesn't- want it?”

“I'm good.” Vyx says.

“Same, I'll opt out.” Ayla responds.

> Decide randomly between the factions.
> Decide randomly between the remaining members.
> Suggest someone in particular. (Write-in)
name: Sylvetica
